alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 18 at 5:24PM EDT until March 18 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN HICKMAN...CARLISLE...SOUTH CENTRAL BALLARD AND SOUTHEASTERN MISSISSIPPI COUNTIES... At 423 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Towosahgy State Historic Site, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. Law enforcement reported wind damage to power lines from this storm near Marston, MO. Emergency management reported hail up to dime size near Libourn, MO. SOURCE...Emergency management and law enforcement. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bardwell. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
